message.body: Hey Gabi... Can I assume that u and macklin are on for lesson after school tomorrow? He has some band homework ... And he'll have it in his folder... Finally, make sure u give Mack an invoice so we can get u paid :-) best, Brian
Yep, we're on for tomorrow, i can do 230 or 330 whatever works for Macklin. Did he not give you the first invoice?
